messages: In the world of organized crime, loyalty is your greatest asset. Stay true to your family, and they'll have your back when it counts.
A boss doesn't worry about problems; a boss solves them. Face challenges head-on and prove you're made of tougher stuff.
In this game, trust is rare, and betrayal is common. Be careful who you confide in, and always have a plan B.
Remember, every setback is a setup for a comeback. When you're down, that's when you show your true strength.
Success in the mafia, as in life, often depends on seizing opportunities. Keep your eyes open for the next big score.
